content: the hubby hat a simple double layer hat to please the picky husband guy design by anna johanna hubby hat you know the type no color no cables no nothing with this simple double layer hat you can try to insert some excitement and color to hubby s wardrobe take a colorful skein of some tickly and prickly wool and one colorless skein of smooth merino goodness he ll feel the difference and be forced to wear his hat the colorful side up @2015 anna johanna all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only neulistimnk on ravelry http //missaneuloimmekerran blogspot com yarn madelinetosh sport in two colors 1 skein each i used yarngrimoire pick-a-sock sport for the other side needles 3 5 mm circular needles a 3 0 mm crochet hook gauge 20 sts x 30 row = 10 x 10 cm size one-size-fits-a-hubby abbreviations co cast on k2tog k2 together ssk slip slip knit slip 1 without knitting slip 1 without knitting move back to the left needle and k together through the back loop dec2 centered decrease slip 2 as if to k2tog slip 1 move all 3 sts back to left needle and k3tog through the back loop cast on co 100 sts using provisional cast on with scrap yarn join in the round and pm to indicate the beginning of round hat number 1 knit in the round using color a until the hat measures about 19 cm from the cast on edge or until desired length decrease round k2tog k21 ssk pm x 4 the following decrease rounds k2tog k until 2 sts before next marker ssk sm x 4 repeat decrease round every other round until 12 sts remain for the last round dec2 x 4 cut the yarn leaving a tail thread the yarn through the remaining 4 sts tighten and weave in the end hat number 2 unravel the provisional cast on and pick up the sts with the right side of hat number 1 facing using color b purl one round continue in stockinette st and knit as hat number 1 remember to tie the yarns together at the cast on edge on the wrong side of the hat before finishing weave the last end inside the hat tube turn hat number 2 inside hat number 1 hand over to the hubby @2015 anna johanna all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only neulistimnk on ravelry http //missaneuloimmekerran
